channel.title: White knights castle, the screwed up version :( (help meeh )
channel.description:
Well, have the Testscape source code, i modded it alot.. but now it comes to the part where i'm putting every npc in its place and make sure it works and stuff. The problem is, the white knights castle doesnt work.
(first up, i don't want any dumb answers like get another source, that pisses me off..)
My doors in the castle (ID = 11727) are kinda.. working, when i put them vertical that is.
Lets say N is north, my doors are:
N N ^ ^ ___ and |
the horizontal ones, ___, arent working, i can only walk trough them in one way, i can walk trough them, walking south, but walking north doesnt work, i just cant walk there, even my yellow cross, you usually see when you walk doesnt appear. Has anyone had this error in the past, and how do i fix it? Thanks for reading, and i hope u can help :|

Well, have the Testscape source code, i modded it alot… but now it comes to the part where i’m putting every npc in its place and make sure it works and stuff. The problem is, the white knights castle doesnt work.

my doors are:

^             ^

___ and |

the horizontal ones, ___, arent working, i can only walk trough them in one way, i can walk trough them, walking south, but walking north doesnt work, i just cant walk there, even my yellow cross, you usually see when you walk doesnt appear.
Has anyone had this error in the past, and how do i fix it?
Thanks for reading, and i hope u can help
